Heritrix isn't usually run inside Tomcat; it already includes its own 
web server (Jetty) for exposing its administrative UI.

(We did offer Heritrix 1.x versions as a WAR, but that was never our 
usual way of running Heritrix, and it's no longer an option in H3, so if 
this is important to you for some reason you'll have to work it out on 
your own.)

- Gordon @ IA
